items.title: Use automated workflows in Base
items.description: After configuring the triggering conditions and actions, Base will automatically perform the actions based on data changes.

items.title: Create and insert a Base
items.description: With Base, you can build flexible lightweight databases that meet your unique business needs.

items.title: Use Base advanced permissions
items.description: Configure who can view and edit specific fields or records in a table, and who can view dashboards.

items.title: Sync data between Bases
items.description: Gather all your key data into a single base by syncing with other Bases.

items.title: Use form view in Base
items.description: Form view converts a table in base into a form. You can send the form to specific groups or your entire network to quickly gather and add information to your table.

items.title: Send sales reports to groups - Base automation use case
items.description: Base's automated workflow enables you to automate the sending of messages to private and group chats, with wide-ranging customization and style options.
